title: Bobby Suggests Missing Jon Pardi's Wedding + Amy Feels Old + Eddie’s Son Cutting Grass Update
itunes:title: Bobby Suggests Missing Jon Pardi's Wedding + Amy Feels Old + Eddie’s Son Cutting Grass Update
description:
We talk to Jon Pardi about driving his tractor to clear his head, his drive-in shows and his upcoming wedding. Bobby offers Jon a chance to retract his wedding invitation. Amy’s movers have never seen a show from the 90’s which made her feel old. Plus, Eddie and his son have reached an agreement on his summer job!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
